# Library

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(psych)

```

# Glimpse

```{r}

glimpse(df)

glimpse(df_2)

```

# Change Column Name

```{r}

df <- df %>% 
  rename(
   "col" =  '446'
  )

df_2 <- df_2 %>% 
  rename(
   "col" =  '510'
  )

```

# Summary 

```{r}

# TODO: calculate summary stats for IBI series

summary(df)

summary(df_2)

```

# Further summaries

```{r}

describe(df)

describe(df_2)

```

# Histogramm

```{r}

hist(df$col)

hist(df_2$col)

```
